name: look_right
quote: If you look right, you can see the whole world from wherever you happen to be.

name: look_left
quote: They look right. And you move left

name: look_up
quote: Look up, now look down. Up is endless, down has an ending. Always look up.

name: look_down
quote: The only time you should look down at someone, is when you are helping them up.

name: lean_right
quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.

name: lean_left
quote: Even though you're fed up, you've got to keep your head up.

name: straight
quote: They say either get right or get left, how about I just go forward and never look back
